title: Project Feature Validation Schema
description: Schema for validating project setup Features and their status

items.title: Project Feature Item
items.description: A single project Feature category with details

id.title: Feature ID
id.description: Feature ID is the unique identifier. Start from 1 and increase by a step size of 1

category.title: Feature Category
category.description: The category of the project Feature (e.g., Setup, Build, Test)

source.title: Feature Source
source.description: Indicates which planning document this Feature was generated from

priority.title: Feature priority
priority.description: Task priority: from p0 to p5, the priority decreases gradually. The priority of p0 is the highest, while that of p5 is the lowest.

steps.title: Sub-Steps
steps.description: List of individual Features under the category, At least one sub-Feature is required

passes.title: Feature Pass Status
passes.description: Whether the Feature category has passed (true) or failed (false)
